thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 73 of 3554
thread.title: Richard

author: Richard
title: Richard
text: I have tried to buy used books from eBay to Amazon. Thrift books always beats them. We homeschool 3 children, therefore it's very important that we find affordable solutions. All the books I've ever bought were anywhere from like new to very used. Even the very used books were acceptable and served their purpose. Shipping is quick as well. I'm very pleased with Thrift Books.
